form.name: create_db_form
form.p: Fill in this form to create an Odoo database. You can create databases for different companies or for different goals (testing, production). Once the database is created, you will be able to install your first application.
By default, the master password is 'admin'. This password is required to create, delete, dump or restore databases.

td.span: Check this box to evaluate Odoo.

label.title: Archive containing a dump of your database and your whole filestore
Binary dump of your database (PostgreSQL dump)

div.h4: Discover Events of Odoo around the world...

div.p: Your user's preference timezone does not match your browser timezone:

p.a: Click here to change your user's timezone.

button.class: btn btn-default dropdown-toggle fa fa-bug oe-view-manager-debug

a.class: fa fa-chevron-left btn btn-default btn-sm oe-pager-button
fa fa-chevron-right btn btn-default btn-sm oe-pager-button

t.t-if: item.create_uid and item.write_uid and item.create_uid[0] != item.write_uid[0]

th.t-attf-class: oe_list_header_#{column.widget or column.type} #{((options.sortable and column.tag !== 'button') ? 'oe_sortable' : null)}

t.t-if: !widget.no_leaf and widget.options.action_buttons !== false and widget.options.addable and widget.is_action_enabled('create')

div.p: No data available for this pivot table. Try to add some records, or make sure that there is at least one measure and no active filter in the search bar.

i.t-att-class: widget.get('value') gte rec.value and 'fa fa-star oe_star_on' or 'fa fa-star oe_star_off'

i.class: fa fa-pencil fa-1g pull-left col-md-offset-1 oe_form_binary_file_edit
i.title: Edit

t.t:
Save
Save & Close Save & New

t.t-esc: filter.attrs.string or filter.attrs.help or filter.attrs.name or 'Î©'

tr.td: This wizard will export all data that matches the current search criteria to a CSV file. You can export all data or only the fields that can be reimported after modification.

tr.th: Fields to export Save fields list

p.strong: Please pay attention that all records matching your search filter will be exported. Not only the selected ids.
Please note that only the selected ids will be exported.

templates.t: Create Create and edit or Cancel
